title: ggplot-extension-club
text:

Extending ggplot2

The extending ggplot2 chapters of the ggplot2 book:

Chapter 19: Programming with ggplot2
Chapter 20: ggplot2 internals
Chapter 21: Writing ggplot2 extensions

The extending ggplot2 vignette

The extensions gallery
The Awesome ggplot2 repository



Talks

Extending your ability to extend ggplot2 by Thomas Lin Pederson at rstudio::conf 2020
Best practises for programming with ggplot2 by Dewey Dunnington at rstudio::conf 2020
Cracking open ggplot internals with {ggtrace} by June Choe at rstudio::conf 2022




a hex

title: ggplot2 extenders
text:
ggplot2 extenders (A.K.A. ggplot extension club) exists to facilitate conversations about ggplot2 extension. https://github.com/EvaMaeRey/everyday_ggplot2_extension

Meetings
Discussion
Workshops (coming soon)

The extension ecosystem is quite big. Other projects that support extenders include:

title: ggplot2 extenders
text:
ggplot2 extenders meets in virtually every few months. Presenters discuss motivation, origins, and challenges of their extension projects!
Interested in joining us? Please drop a note here so we can be in touch.
Upcoming meeting:

{animint2}, Toby Hocking, August 19, 2024

Past meetings

{ggnewscale}, Elio Campitelli, June 22/23, 2024
{ggedit}, Jonathan Sidi, May 11, 2024
A conversation with Di Cook, early extension and {GGally}, March 12/13, 2024
{ggdag}, Malcolm Barrett, Feb 10, 2024
{ggflowchart} Nicola Rennie & {arrowheadr} W. Joel Schneider Nov 4, 2023
{ggeasy} Jonathan Carroll, Sept 2, 2023
{ggsurvfit}, Daniel Sjoberg, June 10, 2023
{ggcirclepack}, Gina Reynolds, April 15, 2023
Fundamentals of Data Visualization, Claus Wilke, Jan 28, 2022
{ggtrace}, June Choe, July 16, 2022
{ggh4x}, Teun Van Den Brand, June 11, 2022
{geomtextpath} Allan Cameron May 7, 2022
{ggbump} David Sjoberg, April 9, 2022
First meeting, March 19, 2022
